definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
lit. the soul of a deceased has not yet dispersed (idiom)/fig. the influence still lingers on/the spirit (of some doctrine) is still alive

sentences.english: But the noteworthy history still haunts this meeting.
sentences.chinese: 但那段兒著名的歷史仍然“陰魂不散”。

sentences.english: Modern thought has transferred the spectral character of Death to the notion of time itself.
sentences.chinese: 現代思想已把死亡的不散陰魂轉化爲時間概念本身。

sentences.english: But even from a distance those fumes linger.
sentences.chinese: 就算離開一段距離，這種味道依然陰魂不散。

sentences.english: Do those who are dead rise up and praise you?
sentences.chinese: 難道陰魂還能起來稱讚你嗎？

sentences.english: Yes, the Crusades died off, but it was regaining popularity.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們雖然相繼死去，但是十字軍的陰魂一直未散。

sentences.english: Long after hope has vanished, these phantom-words remain.
sentences.chinese: 希望破滅許久之後，這些詞句“陰魂不散”。

sentences.english: He told me the ghost of his father appeared at his bedside.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我說他父親的陰魂出現在他的牀邊。

sentences.english: Therefore, lingering ray, Xiao Shan with the set.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一縷陰魂不散，跟定了肖山。

sentences.english: It is meant to frighten off evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 目的是想嚇走陰魂鬼神。

sentences.english: The man that wandereth out of the way of understanding shall remain in the congregation of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 迷離通達道路的，必住在陰魂的會中。

sentences.english: He did not intend, however, to stick around.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，他不打算陰魂不散。

definition: not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
to keep watch beside a coffin
lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
to nail securely/to execute by means of impalement/to crucify
able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
to die of old age/to die in one's bed at a ripe old age
